alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:49AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Buchanan, northeastern Benton, southwestern Delaware and northern Linn Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 248 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Masonville to Walker to near Mount Auburn. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Torrential rainfall with amounts over 1 inch in under an hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Independence, Vinton, Manchester, Center Point, Urbana, Central City, Palo, Shellsburg, Winthrop, Walker, Alburnett, Coggon, Quasqueton, Ryan, Brandon, Rowley, Prairieburg, Mount Auburn, Masonville and Toddville. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 30 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
